info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 3:55PM MDT until July 08 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: The National Weather Service in Missoula has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Lake County in northwestern Montana... Southeastern Sanders County in northwestern Montana... * Until 430 PM MDT. * At 355 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ravalli, or 25 miles north of Missoula, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ravalli, St. Ignatius and Arlee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
